meanings.definition: A viral disease affecting rabbits, characterized by skin tumors and swelling of the mucous membranes.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian diagnosed the rabbit with myxomatosis.
meanings.sent2: The spread of myxomatosis among the wild rabbit population was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit joked that it caught myxomatosis from eating too many carrots.
meanings.sent4: The myxomatosis of rumors in the small town grew out of control.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rabbit covered in myxomatosis tumors was heartbreaking.

meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the myxomatosis to understand its effects on rabbits.
meanings.sent2: The myxomatosis was spreading rapidly through the rabbit population.
meanings.sent3: The myxomatosis virus seemed to have a mind of its own, jumping from one rabbit to another.
meanings.sent4: The myxomatosis of fear gripped the rabbit community.
meanings.sent5: The myxomatosis virus mutated, becoming even more dangerous to rabbits.
